title: Technology Education Remote Delivery Process Utilizing an Iterative Development Model

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer skills and experience accessing learning platforms
context.additional_context: Practice-oriented blended learning for novice learners unfamiliar with non-face-to-face environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain the six stages within the three arenas (analysis, design, development) of IDM
Learners can practice a three-phase iterative development process from low-fidelity prototypes to high-fidelity final deliverables
Learners can complete one type of digital educational content by incorporating peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
